title: Robert and Lauri McNown Endowed Graduate Scholarship Fund
description: To provide merit-based graduate scholarship awards, including research-related expenses, for students enrolled in the Department of Economics with a preference for international students enrolled in the PhD program and in their second year or higher.
marketingContent: To provide merit-based graduate scholarship awards, including research-related expenses, for students enrolled in the Department of Economics with a preference for international students enrolled in the PhD program and in their second year or higher.
